sentences.sentence: DiCaprio began looking for an agent at the age of twelve, but was initially turned down several times; one agent suggested that he anglicize his name to “Lenny Williams”, which DiCaprio rejected.
sentences.translation: 迪卡普里奥在十二岁时开始寻找经纪人，但在最开始时被拒绝了几次；一位经纪人建议他将自己的名字英语化，改为“Lenny Williams”，但迪卡普里奥拒绝了此建议。
